text: Teresita Tan Sy-Coson (born October 1950) is a Filipina businesswoman. She is the vice chairman of SM Investments Corporation (SMIC). The company is one of the Philippines' largest public holding companies. The company was started by her late father Henry Sy. Coson is also the chairman of BDO Unibank. She was recognized as Fortune's 50 Power Business Women. == References == Category:Living people Category:Filipino businesspeople Category:1950 births Category:People from Bulacan
title: Teresita Sy-Coson
